definitions.text: be foolish or senile due to old age
shower with love; show excessive affection for
examples: Grandmother dotes on her the twins

definitions.text: scatter or intersperse like dots or studs

examples: He scattered gun powder under the wagon

definitions.text: extravagantly or foolishly loving and indulgent
examples: deceiving her preoccupied and doting husband with a young captain
hopelessly spoiled by a fond mother
